jurls.reinforcementlearning.domains.arcade.agents

Class RLAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • jurls.reinforcementlearning.domains.arcade.agents.AbstractAgent
      • jurls.reinforcementlearning.domains.arcade.agents.RLAgent

  • public class RLAgent
extends AbstractAgent
    A RL agent which learns using the SARSA(lambda) algorithm and acts according to an epsilon-greedy policy. At the time of writing this comment, the agent is in charge of resetting the system at the end of an episode.
    Author:
    Marc G. Bellemare

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Keeping track of how many episodes we've played

      The agent core (SARSA and epsilon-greedy)

      The action selected by the learner

      Whether we should send a reset action
